name: C.H.I.P (Counter Human Independence Protocol)
description:
C.H.I.P is a FPS game where you must survive against a machine uprising! It is a work in progress game design final year project from a team of passionate student developers.

Download the game and don't forget to provide us with some feedback as we are constantly working on improving the game! Use the feedback form link below or if you can't, leave us some feedback in the comments.

https://forms.gle/KRTNLG1cVKCH2VkL8 - Feedback Form

C.H.I.P Team:

  • Matthew Brown - Project Manager/QA.
  • Eric Gardiner - Artist/Graphics/UI/Asset Designer.
  • Brendan Jackson - Game Designer and Writer.
  • Thishen Packirisamy - Programmer.
  • Ryan Van Zyl - Sound design/Music composer/Visual Effects
  • Brenton Budler - Programmer.

Digital Arts @ University of the Witwatersrand, South Africa
